DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether kinesitherapy technique myofascial therapy protocol effective treatment temporomandibular joint dysfunction patient fibromyalgia syndrome .
DOC.brief_title: Physiotherapy Deontology Temporomandibular Joint Dysfunction Patients With Fibromyalgia Syndrome .
DOC.detailed_description: Design : randomized clinical trial . Objective : compare therapeutic effect physiotherapy deontology protocol improve pain , quality life , physical function , quality sleep , depression , anxiety , clinical severity , clinical improvement , diagnostic criterion research temporomandibular joint dysfunction patient fibromyalgia syndrome ( FMS ) . Background : result physiotherapy benefit temporomandibular joint dysfunction patient FMS controversial . Descriptive data intervention study still scarce . Methods measure : sixty patient randomly assign experimental control group . The experimental group receive 24 session ( twice week ) kinesitherapy myofascial release protocol , whereas control group undergo deontology therapy ( port deprogramming occlusal splint every night , average 8 hour per day , 12 week treatment ) . Pain level , impact FMS symptom , quality sleep , depression , anxiety , clinical severity , clinical improvement diagnostic criterion research temporomandibular joint dysfunction collect group baseline 12 week 48-hr last intervention experimental control group , assessor blind treatment allocation patient . Baseline demographic clinical variable examine group independent Student t-test continuous data Ï‡2 test independence categorical data . Separate 2x2 mixed model ANCOVAs time ( pre-post ) within-subjects factor , group ( experimental , control ) determine effect treatment pain , function , quality sleep , depression , anxiety , clinical severity , clinical improvement diagnostic criterion research temporomandibular joint dysfunction dependent variable .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis fibromyalgia syndrome . Agreement attend even therapy session . A chief complaint acute pain ( duration < 6 month ) temporomandibular joint least one side . The presence joint click jaw opening eliminate protrusive opening . History recent trauma . Therapeutic cointerventions treatment . Indication surgical treatment temporomandibular joint . Edentulism . Physical mental illness precludes attendance therapy session .
